name: Stock-Up!
description:
This game was (mostly, except for general polish and balancing) made in under one hour as a challenge. Expect the unexpected!

Have you ever wanted to know what it was like to earn big? Well, you're in luck because this game allows you to ride the wave of some very volatile investments to the moon - if you got the reactions to sell when it crashes.

Controls:

Spacebar - Press and hold, to BUY (while the stocks are going up), release to SELL (while stocks are going down)

Have fun!

(Thank you to Kenney for providing the font for the game! Check it out, along with a ton of other free assets at https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts)
